text: Aurat pukārī, “Bādshāh kī hayāt kī qasam, jo kuchh bhī mere āqā farmāte haiṅ wuh nishāne par lag jātā hai, ḳhāh bandā bāīṅ yā dāīṅ taraf haṭne kī koshish kyoṅ na kare. Jī hāṅ, āp ke ḳhādim Yoāb ne mujhe āp ke huzūr bhej diyā. Us ne mujhe lafz balafz sab kuchh batāyā jo mujhe āp ko arz karnā thā,
